oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Walter Winchell's Jergens Journal - 1943-09-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC Blue Network program Walter Winchell's Jergens Journal, with announcer Ben Grauer and host Walter Winchell. Originally broadcast 1943-09-12, sponsored by Jergens Lotion. Recording beings with the end of the previous program Keepsakes, featuring John Carter (host), George Putnam (announcer), the Carter Orchestra and Chorus directed by Harry Sosnik, and vocalists Dorothy Kirsten and Mark Harrell, sponsored by Carter's Little Liver Pills.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dorothy Kirsten; Mack Harrell; Carter Orchestra; Harry Sosnik
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: George Putnam talks -- Closing statement (John Carter) -- Closing theme (Dorothy Kirsten, Mack Harrell, Carter Orchestra, Harry Sosnik) -- Carter's Little Liver Pills commercial -- Network ID announcement -- Opening statement (Ben Grauer) -- Jergens Lotion commercial (Ben Grauer) -- Ben Grauer introduces Walter Winchell -- News report (Walter Winchell) -- Closing statement (Walter Winchell) -- Jergens Face Cream commercial (Ben Grauer) -- Closing statement (Ben Grauer)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blue Network Company; Keepsakes (Radio program); Kirsten, Dorothy, 1910-1992; Harrell, Mack; Winchell, Walter, 1897-1972; Grauer, Ben; Sosnik, Harry, 1906-1996
